T02D1518:36a-0: @36a * // gtor ma'i cho ga rin chen aa sma garbha bzhugs so //
T02D1518:36a-1: bcom ldan 'das dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1518:36a-2: sa gsum ma lus stobs rang bzhin //
T02D1518:36a-3: mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rig mar bcas //
T02D1518:36a-4: bla ma rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1518:36a-5: gtor ma'i de nyid brjod par bya //
T02D1518:36a-6: de la mtshan phyed dam ji ltar khom pa'i dus su rang gi lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas //
T02D1518:36a-7: gtor ma shin tu chen po nya dang sha la sogs pa dang /
T02D1518:36a-8: zan dang chang dang nye bar spyad pa lnga dang bdud rtsi dang bcas pa mdun du bzhag ste /
T02D1518:36a-9: de yang ma dmigs pa las 'og tu yam sngo skya de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1518:36a-10: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can mtha' gnyis na ba dan gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1518:36a-11: de'i steng du ram dmar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1518:36a-12: me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa 'bar bas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1518:36a-13: de'i steng gi grva gsum las mdun nas g-yon skor du dkar ba dang /
T02D1518:36a-15: gnag pa'i aom a'a: h'um gsum yongs su gyur pa
T02D1518:36a-16: las keng rus kyi mgo gsum gyi sgyed po dang
T02D1518:36a-17: / de'i steng du aa dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1518:36a-18: thod pa'i snod chen po bsams te /
T02D1518:36a-19: de'i shar du bi dkar pho dang /
T02D1518:36a-20: byad du mu ljang gu dang /
T02D1518:36a-21: nub tu ma dmar po dang /
T02D1518:36a-23: dbus su aa dkar po yongs su gyur pa las dri chen dang /
T02D1518:36b-0: byang @36b chub kyi sems rnams su gyur te rang rang gi yi ges mtshan pa'o //
T02D1518:36b-4: rlung dang dbang ldan dang dbus rnams rim pa bzhin du /
T02D1518:36b-5: go ku da ha na dkar pa dang sngo ba dang dmar ba dang ljang ba dang /
T02D1518:36b-6: sngo ba rnams yongs su gyur pa las pa lang dang /
T02D1518:36b-7: khyi dang glang po che dang rta dang mi'i sha rnams la rang rang gi yi ges mtshan pa'o //
T02D1518:36b-8: de'i steng du h'um dkar po kha 'og tu bltas
T02D1518:36b-9: pa yongs su gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin
T02D1518:36b-10: gyi keng rus kyi kha tv'am ga 'og tu bltas
T02D1518:36b-11: pa h'um gis mtshan pa bsams te /
T02D1518:36b-12: de g-yon du 'khor bas rlung g-yos pas me sbar
T02D1518:36b-13: te thams cad zhu nas ser po sla ba'i dngos
T02D1518:36b-14: por gyur te rlangs pa nam mkha' la chags pa
T02D1518:36b-16: g-yas skor du a'a li dang k'a li'i phreng bar
T02D1518:36b-17: gyur te de rnams 'dres shing yongs su gyur pa
T02D1518:36b-18: las kha dog gsum dang ldan pa'i yi ge gsum
T02D1518:36b-19: du gyur te de dag las khams gsum gyi ngo
T02D1518:36b-20: bo'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi lha'i tshogs
T02D1518:36b-21: spros te sems can thams cad kyang bde ba dang
T02D1518:36b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
T02D1518:36b-24: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi
T02D1518:36b-25: tshul du bkug pa snyoms par zhugs pas yi ge
T02D1518:36b-27: de dag kyang rim gyis 'og tu lhung bas gtor ma la thim ste /
T02D1518:36b-28: kha tv'am ga yang zhu bas kha dog dkar po bsil ba phun sum tshogs par bltas te /
T02D1518:36b-29: yi ge gsum ji tsam 'dod par bzlas so //
T02D1518:36b-30: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer dang
T02D1518:36b-31: skye gnas kyi phyag rgya dpral bar bskor ba dang
T02D1518:36b-32: / mig steng du blta ba dang /
T02D1518:36b-33: phat kyi sgra dang rkang pa mnan pa'i sbyor ba
T02D1518:36b-34: rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs
T02D1518:36b-35: pa'i dkyil 'khor mdun gyi nam mkha' chos 'byung chen
T02D1518:36b-36: po'i nang du spyan drangs te padma'i lag pa bskor
T02D1518:36b-37: nas snying gar se gol brdab par bya'o //
T02D1518:36b-38: de nas zhabs bsil la sogs pa dang /
T02D1518:36b-39: me tog la sogs pa lnga dang /
T02D1518:36b-40: pi wang ma la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1518:36b-41: lag pa g-yon par a'a li las zla ba dang /
T02D1518:36b-42: g-yas par k'a li las nyi ma dang kha sbyar
T02D1518:36b-43: ba'i dbus su h'um kha dog sngon po bsams te
T02D1518:37a-0: / aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharm'a @37a * //
T02D1518:37a-1: h'um aom pa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishti: sarba dharm'a h'um /
T02D1518:37a-2: aom aa tyan t'a nu pra pishta: sarba dharm'a h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02D1518:37a-3: lag pa rdo rje rtse lnga bar bsgoms te thal
T02D1518:37a-4: mo kha phye la lag par gtor ma bzhag la
T02D1518:37a-5: rnam pa gsum dbyer med pa'i ngo bor lhag par
T02D1518:37a-6: dmigs te / lha mo tshad ma'o dam tshig tshad ma de //
T02D1518:37a-7: des gsungs dag kyang mchog tu tshad ma'o //
T02D1518:37a-8: des ni bden bar gyur cig 'di ru ni //
T02D1518:37a-9: lha mos bdag la rjes 'dzin rgyur gyur cig /
T02D1518:37a-10: ces brjod de lha rnams kyis ljags h'um dkar po
T02D1518:37a-11: las rdo rje bsams la aom aa ralli ho: dza:
T02D1518:37a-12: h'um bam ho: // badzra d'a ki ni sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho://
T02D1518:37a-13: zhes bya bas lan lngar brjod pas dur khrod na
T02D1518:37a-14: gnas pa ma gtogs pas rdo rje'i sbu gus drangs
T02D1518:37a-16: de nas yang zhal bsil la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02D1518:37a-17: so rtsi yang phul te rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa
T02D1518:37a-18: brgyad pa rkang pa brgyad pa dang bcas pas bstod
T02D1518:37a-19: pa dang / 'dod pa'i don la bslang ba dang /
T02D1518:37a-21: yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02D1518:37a-22: de nas dur khrod pa rnams kyi lce byin gyis
T02D1518:37a-23: brlabs te aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi sarba
T02D1518:37a-24: yaksha r'aksha sa / bh'u ta pre ta pi sh'a tsa aunm'a da /
T02D1518:37a-25: aa pa sm'a ra d'a ka d'a ki n+ya da
T02D1518:37a-26: ya ai mam ba lim grihna ntu sarba siddhi mme
T02D1518:37a-27: pra ya tstsha ntu ya thee bam ya theeshtam /
T02D1518:37a-29: pi wa tha m'a ti kra ma tha ma ma sarba karta ya /
T02D1518:37a-30: satshu kha bi briddha ye ma ma sa h'a yi ka bha wa ntu h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1518:37a-31: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod pas thams cad kyis 'thungs par bsam mo //
T02D1518:37a-32: de nas de rnams la yang mchod pa la sogs pa thams cad sngar bzhin byas la /
T02D1518:37a-33: srid dang zhi ba mnyam pas zhen pa bcom zhing kun du rtog pa bcom //
T02D1518:37a-34: dngos dang dngos po ma yin thams cad mkha' bzhin rnam par gzigs pa rnams //
T02D1518:37a-35: bla ma mchog gi thugs rje'i chu spro thugs ni chu yi mgon po rnams //
T02D1518:37a-36: mdzod cig mdzod cig lha mos bdag la rjes su thugs ni brtse bar mdzod //
T02D1518:37a-37: ces brjod la mig gi phyag rgya bstan la padma'i lag pas bskor /
T02D1518:37a-38: lte bar 'khyud pas se gol gtogs te /
T02D1518:37a-39: aom badzra mandala mu: zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor bdag nyid mdzod spu nas gzhug par bya ste /
T02D1518:37b-0: rol mo dang mar me'i snang ba dang bcas pas bskyal @37b par bya'o //
T02D1518:37b-1: gtor ma'i cho ga bya ba las //
T02D1518:37b-2: byung ba'i dge bas 'gro ba kun //
T02D1518:37b-3: lus sems bde bas gnas gyur cig / stobs bcu
T02D1518:37b-4: dang yang ldan par shog / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya
T02D1518:37b-5: mtsho'i rgyud kyi gtor ma'i cho ga rin po che
T02D1518:37b-6: aasma ganbha mkhas pa dza ya se na'i gsung dpal
